rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses financial/trade metrics ('cutting the NIAID budget by 23.9%'), which are Neutral under Rule 6.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a negative fact (budget cut) and lacks explicit calming language.
'We were the only NIH institute' uses 'only' with an implied contrast to all other NIH institutes.
